Experience

Graduate Research Assistant

Department of Chemistry, Louisiana State University · 2021 — 2025

Lead computational studies of solid–liquid interfaces using classical and ab initio molecular dynamics, enhanced sampling, and machine-learning potentials.

  • Developed ML potentials for GO–Water, GO-Methanol, Glyme-Graphene, Ion Exchange Membranes.
  • Automated workflows for data generation, model training, and validation using active learning.
  • Mentored undergraduate researchers on simulation project.

Academic Cooperation Participant

Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory · 2025 — Present

Investigation water and chloride ion transport in carbon nanotube porins with ML potential.

Computational Chemistry Material Science Graduate Intern

Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory · May 2025 — August 2025

Investigated transport in nanofluidic channels.

  • Investigated ion and proton transport through functionalized ultrashort carbon nanotube (CNT) porins under confinement
  • Developed MACE potential to simulate pH-responsive pore gating behavior
  • Performed metadynamics simulations to quantify proton conductance using proton-defect-based CVs

Instructor at Molecular Simulations Workshop

Louisiana State University · June 2024 — July 2024

Demonstrated molecular dynamics simulation tools.

  • Assisted in instructing undergraduate students in computational chemistry techniques and methodologies
  • Guided students through research projects, providing mentorship and technical support
  • Created template code and facilitated hands-on laboratory sessions

Graduate Teaching Assistant

Department of Chemistry, Louisiana State University · 2021 — 2022

Instructed undergraduate students in CHEM 1212, supervised experiments, proctored exams, and graded lab reports.

Education

Ph.D. in Chemistry with Minor in Computer Science

Louisiana State University, Baton Rouge, Louisiana

Dissertation: COMPUTATIONAL NANOSCALE INVESTIGATIONS OF STRUCTURE, DYNAMICS, AND REACTIVITY AT SOLID–LIQUID INTERFACES.

B.Sc. in Applied Chemistry & Chemical Engineering

University of Dhaka, Dhaka, Bangladesh
